TopicTitle: Unable to create maneuver nodes on map

Articles.Content:
Hi there,

I'm experiencing an issue, which has persisted through new career's as well, in which I am unable to create any kind of maneuver node in the map screen. Even in the tutorial (the first Mun mission tutorial, for example, where it specifically asks you to create a maneuver node) I am not able to do so.

In my career, I am also unable to create any maneuver nodes. If I click on the orbit, it is always gray, and is never selected.

Has anyone experienced this, or is aware of a workaround? The orbits never turn yellow (as in the past), so is this a bug?

Regards,

Laughingstok
Hi Laughingstok, have you upgraded your tracking station and mission control buildings yet?

Hi Laughingstok, have you upgraded your tracking station and mission control buildings yet?

Hi sal_vager! I have not in my career mode, so that may explain it! However, why am I also unable to do this in the tutorial?
I found out why, there's a bug with tutorials not resetting building states, if you start a sandbox game first it'll fix it.
